title: Chhota Bheem & Krishna: Mayanagari
short_cast: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
cast: Vatsal Dubey, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Mousam, Swapnil
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: Young lord Krishna has fallen for demoness Maayandri’s revenge plot against him! Can Bheem rescue him and thwart Maayandri’s other destructive plans?
